summary: Completed comprehensive testing of image upload functionality across admin panel. All ImageUploader components working correctly with URL and Upload modes in Courses, Blogs, Teachers, Testimonials, and Slides sections.

Admin Courses ImageUploader - URL and Upload modes working
Admin Teachers ImageUploader - URL and Upload modes working
Admin Testimonials ImageUploader - URL and Upload modes working
Admin Slides ImageUploader - URL and Upload modes working
Admin Blogs ImageUploader - URL and Upload modes working for content blocks
URL input with image preview functionality working
Upload mode 'Choose File' button present and functional
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Admin login and navigation working correctly
All admin sections accessible and functional
